page.title: 08PUBS IN REDCAR
page.content: There are several pubs in the area, typical of these pubs is the Oasis. The Oasis public house is situated in the North_East corner of Roseberry Square Shopping Centre to cope with demand from the new estates built nearby. Being a working mens pub,beer is 3 times as popular lager and cider.The public drink about 3600 pints a week, the 60 regulars drink about 2 thirds of it.The house is owned by a company (The nation wide group.)Deliverys come once a week(about 500 gallons).They always have a supply lasting about 10 days.An interesting feet is that the younger generation prefer cider to beer.These basic facts seem to be the same throughout all the pubs in this area.
